au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.server

Class RootServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.server.RootServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class RootServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Root URL servlet which provides an online administrative interface to the rig client.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • authenticate

        private boolean authenticate(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Attempts to authenticate the request. The request may be successful if the request provides the correct username / password pair in the attributes 'username' and 'password' or the correct identity token is provided in the 'identtok' attribute.
        Parameters:
        req - request
        Returns:
        true if authenticate succeeds
